titles.title: Presidential Library Donation Reform Act of 2014
Presidential Library Donation Reform Act of 2014
A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to require information on contributors to Presidential library fundraising organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Carper under authority of the order of the Senate of 08/05/2014 with amendments. With written report No. 113-245.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 532.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
